study_plan_entry.title: Fracture Mechanics and Fatigue of Structures

free_text.Learning outcomes: To introduce the theory of fracture mechanics and fatigue, and its application to civil engineering structures
free_text.Content: [li] Plated steel structures : Fatigue strength of welded steel elements, application of fracture mechanics, weld improvement and quality assurance methods [br/][li] Tubular steel structures : Welded joints, hot spot stress, cast steel joints, fatigue design[br/][li] Riveted structures : Evaluation of fatigue safety of riveted structures, fatigue reinforcement with carbon fibre lamellas[br/][li] Reinforced concrete structures : Fracture mechanics, fracture of concrete, size effect, brittle failure, fatigue of reinforced concrete elements, evaluation of fatigue safety of bridge decks, fracture due to dynamic effects.[br/]
free_text.Keywords: Fracture mechanics, fatigue, steel structures, concrete structures, structural safety

en.title: Fracture Mechanics and Fatigue of Structures
